Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great pizza, if you're ok waiting for a loooong time. With all the deliveroo/foodora orders,you don't realise how many people are actually in the queue ahead of you. Last time we went we waited 45 mins for our pizza. Would have been ok if …

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Extremely impolite and unpleasant experience. Understaffed place and pizzas are not worth waiting +1/2 an hour. On top of it, I can not remember being so rudely treated by a restaurant staff twice younger than myself. Disgusting. Plenty of other places in De Pijp. Forget this one.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: walked in and the staff caught my eye. we sit down and the staff are just chatting. so we wait 15 mins until we just found another pizza place to go to. the staff looked at us as we stood up and walked out and just continued their chatter. worst restaurant experience ive ever had in amsterdam, shame.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Very nice place, simple interior design with a magic italian vibe. Staff really friendly. The pizza was a little dry.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Tasty and original pizzas! Fresh ingredients and crusty base. The best I had so far in Amsterdam.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: The blonde girl who works there makes the best pizza's. The rest need some more training.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great pizza and lovely people. Small and efficient pizza place

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Nice staff, great Pizza, good price!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Service was straightforward. You pay when you order and the pizza was good.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Absolutely fantastic pizza!!! Really would reccomend.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Awesome pizza from a very beautiful wood oven!

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Great place, lovely staff, the food is absolutely fantastic. Highly recommended

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Quality dropped recently. Shame, it was my go to pizza place.

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Vegetariana omg omg omg

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: Decent pizzas

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Super tent, wait 40 minutes for two cold pizzas whose box tastes better than the pizza itself. …

Review Text: (Translated by Google) Call it pizza ... Let's say that it is a good crunchy focaccia with excellent and very fresh ingredients used, to signal the impossibility of paying for cash ... Curious …

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Good pizza is disappointing that at super busy moments orders are still being made for uber etc while the store is full …

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Very tasty pizzas. In vacations the quality decreases due to holiday forces. This pizzeria can also be found on foodora …

Name: Da Portare Via
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Top pizzas, small menu but really super tasty. Homemade tiramisu ... Delicious too …
